thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com
thread.title: Customer Marie M. Merzon
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Customer Marie M. Merzon

author: Customer  Marie M. Merzon
title: Customer Marie M. Merzon
text:
I had purchased Au Savage cologne for my husband for many years, and from various purveyors. I decided to "go to the source" and place an order with Dior, one of my better decisions!
Dior's price is highly competitive and every other part of the experience was superior.
The order was processed immediately, the outer packing was protective, and the box, finished with a lovely ribbon, provided an unexpected gift surprise.
I have only praise for my first Dior experience and will continue to buy
"from the source". Marie M. Merzon
